gw.bizrules.pcf

Interface CommandDefinitionUIConfig.CommandParameterUIConfig

  • Enclosing interface:
    CommandDefinitionUIConfig

    public static interface CommandDefinitionUIConfig.CommandParameterUIConfig

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<ExpressionInputMode> getAvailableModes()
      Which CommandParameterInputModes should be available for this parameter A value of null (default) will use all legal modes for this parameter's type, as defined in the corresponding IRuleAction's getCommandParameters()
      ExpressionInputMode getDefaultMode()
      The default ExpressionInputMode for this parameter.
      default java.lang.Integer getValueWidth()
      If the input for this parameter is a dropdown, return the pixel width the dropdown.
      default boolean isVisible()
      Whether or not this parameter will be displayed when using a default CommandDefinitionDVMode.
      void onContextChange(RuleContextDefinitionProvider context, RuleCommandParameterHolder holder)
      Handle anything that needs to be done upon a change of context

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        default boolean isVisible()
        Whether or not this parameter will be displayed when using a default CommandDefinitionDVMode. Defaults to true.

      • onContextChange

        void onContextChange(RuleContextDefinitionProvider context,
                     RuleCommandParameterHolder holder)
        Handle anything that needs to be done upon a change of context

      • getAvailableModes

        java.util.Set<ExpressionInputMode> getAvailableModes()
        Which CommandParameterInputModes should be available for this parameter A value of null (default) will use all legal modes for this parameter's type, as defined in the corresponding IRuleAction's getCommandParameters()

      • getDefaultMode

        ExpressionInputMode getDefaultMode()
        The default ExpressionInputMode for this parameter. A value of null will cause the first legal mode to be chosen from getAvailableModes(), obeying iteration order.

      • getValueWidth

        default java.lang.Integer getValueWidth()
        If the input for this parameter is a dropdown, return the pixel width the dropdown. Use null for the default width.
